content:
I think we've got a pattern going on here! As I mentioned earlier, it's unlikely you'll be able to bring your guitar to a music festival, so you might want to focus on finding a local music store or guitar technician in your area for servicing.

That being said, it's great to hear you've been playing your guitar every day! Consistent practice is key to improving your skills and developing your musical style.

When you do take your guitar in for servicing, be sure to ask the technician about any specific issues you've noticed, such as tuning problems, buzzing strings, or fretboard concerns. They'll be able to assess your guitar and provide recommendations for maintenance and repairs.

Remember to also ask about any lessons or classes they might offer, either for guitar or violin. Many music stores offer group or private lessons, and it's a great way to learn from experienced instructors and connect with other musicians in your area.

Keep rocking, and I hope you find a great music store to support your musical journey!
